SEARCH
Package controller

Class CampController

java.lang.Object
controller.CampController
public class CampController extends Object
Controller class for managing various operations related to camps. This includes accessing, updating, and managing camps data, and handling camp participant slots.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CampController()
    Constructor to initialize the CampController with a specific camp database.

    • checkSlots

      public boolean checkSlots(Camp camp, ParticipantFilter participantFilter)
      Checks if there are available slots for a participant in a given camp, based on the participant filter (attendee or camp committee).
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to check.
      participantFilter - The type of participant (ATTENDEE or CAMP_COMMITTEE).
      Returns:
      true if slots are available, false otherwise.

    • withdrawParticipant

      public boolean withdrawParticipant(Camp camp, int id, ParticipantFilter participantFilter)
      Withdraws a participant from a camp based on the provided ID and participant filter.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp from which to withdraw the participant.
      id - The ID of the participant.
      participantFilter - The type of participant (ATTENDEE or CAMP_COMMITTEE).
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.
